title._content: View of Red Light District on C Street, N.W. near 13th, with Griffin Veatch who was showing the photographer around No. 6 Special Messenger Service, 04/16/1912

description._content: Original Caption: View of Red Light District on C Street, N.W. near 13th, with Griffin Veatch who was showing the photographer around No. 6 Special Messenger Service, 1223 New York Avenue, N.W.. Griffin Veatch said he commenced the messenger service when he was 11 years old. He says he was 17, but he did not look it. He was known to a truant officer and his family had trouble with him. Quite profane, but (apparently) not very wise about this district although he said he goes to these houses occasionally., 04/16/1912 U.S. National Archives’ Local Identifier: NWL-233-PACCBILL-63AD5-14 ARC ID: 306627 Photographer: Hine, Lewis Created By: U.S. House of Representatives. (03/04/1789 - ) From: Record Group/Collection: 233 From: Papers Accompanying Specific Bills and Resolutions of the 63rd Congress Committee on the District of Columbia, 04/07/1913 - 03/03/1915 Series Dates: 1913-1915 Production Dates: 04/16/1912 Persistent URL: arcweb.archives.gov/arc/action/ExternalIdSearch?id=306627 Repository Contact Information: Center for Legislative Archives (NWL), National Archives Building Reproductions may be ordered via an independent vendor. NARA maintains a list of vendors at www.archives.gov/research/order/vendors-photos-maps-dc.html Access Restrictions: Unrestricted Use Restrictions: Unrestricted
